sqlMap.select: select ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_SMALLTYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, IS_PAYERPAYFEE, FEE, REALPAY_AMOUNT, REALOUT_AMOUNT, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, BUSINESS_BATCH_NO, SUCCESS_AMOUNT, SUCCESS_FEE, PAYMENT_COUNT, SUCCESS_COUNT from FO.BATCH_PAYMENTORDER where ORDER_ID = #orderId:DECIMAL#

select ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_SMALLTYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, IS_PAYERPAYFEE, FEE, REALPAY_AMOUNT, REALOUT_AMOUNT, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, BUSINESS_BATCH_NO, SUCCESS_AMOUNT, SUCCESS_FEE, PAYMENT_COUNT, SUCCESS_COUNT from FO.BATCH_PAYMENTORDER
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT 200 || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'yymmddhh24mi') || LPAD(SEQ_FO_GLOBE_CYCLE.nextval, 6, 0) AS ID FROM DUAL
insert into FO.BATCH_PAYMENTORDER (ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_SMALLTYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, IS_PAYERPAYFEE, FEE, REALPAY_AMOUNT, REALOUT_AMOUNT, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, BUSINESS_BATCH_NO, SUCCESS_AMOUNT, SUCCESS_FEE, PAYMENT_COUNT, SUCCESS_COUNT) values (#orderId:DECIMAL#, #orderType:DECIMAL#, #orderSmallType:VARCHAR#, #orderStatus:DECIMAL#, #orderAmount:DECIMAL#, #isPayerPayFee:DECIMAL#, #fee:DECIMAL#, #realpayAmount:DECIMAL#, #realoutAmount:DECIMAL#, #payerName:VARCHAR#, #payerLoginName:VARCHAR#, #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#, #payerMemberType:DECIMAL#, #payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#, #payerAcctType:DECIMAL#, #creator:VARCHAR#, #createDate:TIMESTAMP#, #updateDate:TIMESTAMP#, #businessBatchNo:VARCHAR#, #successAmount:DECIMAL#, #successFee:DECIMAL#, #paymentCount:DECIMAL#, #successCount:DECIMAL#)
sqlMap.update: update FO.BATCH_PAYMENTORDER set ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:DECIMAL#, ORDER_SMALLTYPE = #orderSmallType:VARCHAR#, ORDER_STATUS = #orderStatus:DECIMAL#, ORDER_AMOUNT = #orderAmount:DECIMAL#, IS_PAYERPAYFEE = #isPayerPayFee:DECIMAL#, FEE = #fee:DECIMAL#, REALPAY_AMOUNT = #realpayAmount:DECIMAL#, REALOUT_AMOUNT = #realoutAmount:DECIMAL#, PAYER_NAME = #payerName:VARCHAR#, PAYER_LOGINNAME = #payerLoginName:VARCHAR#, PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE = #payerMemberType:DECIMAL#, PAYER_ACCTCODE = #payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#, PAYER_ACCTTYPE = #payerAcctType:DECIMAL#, CREATOR = #creator:VARCHAR#, CREATE_DATE = #createDate:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATE_DATE = #updateDate:TIMESTAMP#, BUSINESS_BATCH_NO = #businessBatchNo:VARCHAR#, SUCCESS_AMOUNT = #successAmount:DECIMAL#, SUCCESS_FEE = #successFee:DECIMAL#, PAYMENT_COUNT = #paymentCount:DECIMAL#, SUCCESS_COUNT = #successCount:DECIMAL# where ORDER_ID = #orderId:DECIMAL#

update FO.BATCH_PAYMENTORDER
ORDER_TYPE = #orderType:DECIMAL#
ORDER_SMALLTYPE = #orderSmallType:VARCHAR#
ORDER_STATUS = #orderStatus:DECIMAL#
ORDER_AMOUNT = #orderAmount:DECIMAL#
IS_PAYERPAYFEE = #isPayerPayFee:DECIMAL#
FEE = #fee:DECIMAL#
REALPAY_AMOUNT = #realpayAmount:DECIMAL#
REALOUT_AMOUNT = #realoutAmount:DECIMAL#
PAYER_NAME = #payerName:VARCHAR#
PAYER_LOGINNAME = #payerLoginName:VARCHAR#
PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#
PAYER_MEMBERTYPE = #payerMemberType:DECIMAL#
PAYER_ACCTCODE = #payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#
PAYER_ACCTTYPE = #payerAcctType:DECIMAL#
CREATOR = #creator:VARCHAR#
CREATE_DATE = #createDate:TIMESTAMP#
UPDATE_DATE = #updateDate:TIMESTAMP#
BUSINESS_BATCH_NO = #businessBatchNo:VARCHAR#
SUCCESS_AMOUNT = #successAmount:DECIMAL#
SUCCESS_FEE = #successFee:DECIMAL#
PAYMENT_COUNT = #paymentCount:DECIMAL#
SUCCESS_COUNT = #successCount:DECIMAL#
where ORDER_ID = #orderId:DECIMAL#

update FO.BATCH_PAYMENTORDER
ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:DECIMAL#
ORDER_TYPE = #record.orderType:DECIMAL#
ORDER_SMALLTYPE = #record.orderSmallType:VARCHAR#
ORDER_STATUS = #record.orderStatus:DECIMAL#
ORDER_AMOUNT = #record.orderAmount:DECIMAL#
IS_PAYERPAYFEE = #record.isPayerPayFee:DECIMAL#
FEE = #record.fee:DECIMAL#
REALPAY_AMOUNT = #record.realpayAmount:DECIMAL#
REALOUT_AMOUNT = #record.realoutAmount:DECIMAL#
PAYER_NAME = #record.payerName:VARCHAR#
PAYER_LOGINNAME = #record.payerLoginName:VARCHAR#
PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #record.payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#
PAYER_MEMBERTYPE = #record.payerMemberType:DECIMAL#
PAYER_ACCTCODE = #record.payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#
PAYER_ACCTTYPE = #record.payerAcctType:DECIMAL#
CREATOR = #record.creator:VARCHAR#
CREATE_DATE = #record.createDate:TIMESTAMP#
UPDATE_DATE = #record.updateDate:TIMESTAMP#
BUSINESS_BATCH_NO = #record.businessBatchNo:VARCHAR#
SUCCESS_AMOUNT = #record.successAmount:DECIMAL#
SUCCESS_FEE = #record.successFee:DECIMAL#
PAYMENT_COUNT = #record.paymentCount:DECIMAL#
SUCCESS_COUNT = #record.successCount:DECIMAL#

update FO.BATCH_PAYMENTORDER set ORDER_ID = #record.orderId:DECIMAL#, ORDER_TYPE = #record.orderType:DECIMAL#, ORDER_SMALLTYPE = #record.orderSmallType:VARCHAR#, ORDER_STATUS = #record.orderStatus:DECIMAL#, ORDER_AMOUNT = #record.orderAmount:DECIMAL#, IS_PAYERPAYFEE = #record.isPayerPayFee:DECIMAL#, FEE = #record.fee:DECIMAL#, REALPAY_AMOUNT = #record.realpayAmount:DECIMAL#, REALOUT_AMOUNT = #record.realoutAmount:DECIMAL#, PAYER_NAME = #record.payerName:VARCHAR#, PAYER_LOGINNAME = #record.payerLoginName:VARCHAR#, PAYER_MEMBERCODE = #record.payerMemberCode:DECIMAL#, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE = #record.payerMemberType:DECIMAL#, PAYER_ACCTCODE = #record.payerAcctCode:VARCHAR#, PAYER_ACCTTYPE = #record.payerAcctType:DECIMAL#, CREATOR = #record.creator:VARCHAR#, CREATE_DATE = #record.createDate:TIMESTAMP#, UPDATE_DATE = #record.updateDate:TIMESTAMP#, BUSINESS_BATCH_NO = #record.businessBatchNo:VARCHAR#, SUCCESS_AMOUNT = #record.successAmount:DECIMAL#, SUCCESS_FEE = #record.successFee:DECIMAL#, PAYMENT_COUNT = #record.paymentCount:DECIMAL#, SUCCESS_COUNT = #record.successCount:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select: select ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_SMALLTYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, IS_PAYERPAYFEE, FEE, REALPAY_AMOUNT, REALOUT_AMOUNT, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, BUSINESS_BATCH_NO, SUCCESS_AMOUNT, SUCCESS_FEE, PAYMENT_COUNT, SUCCESS_COUNT from fo.batch_paymentorder a where order_type=2 and order_status=101 and rownum<31 and a.payment_count=(select count(1) from pay_toacctorder b where b.order_type=2 and b.order_status in(111,112,113) and b.parent_orderId=a.order_Id)

select ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_SMALLTYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, IS_PAYERPAYFEE, FEE, REALPAY_AMOUNT, REALOUT_AMOUNT, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, CREATOR, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, BUSINESS_BATCH_NO, SUCCESS_AMOUNT, SUCCESS_FEE, PAYMENT_COUNT, SUCCESS_COUNT from fo.batch_paymentorder a where order_type=4 and order_status=101 and rownum<31 and a.payment_count=(select count(1) from fundout_order b where b.order_type=4 and b.order_status in(111,112,113) and b.parent_orderId=a.order_Id)

select nvl(sum(decode(order_status,111,0,112,1,113,1)),0) fail_count, nvl(sum(decode(order_status,111,1,112,0,113,0)),0) success_count, nvl(sum(decode(order_status,111,0,112,order_amount,113,order_amount)),0) fail_amount, nvl(sum(decode(order_status,112,0,113,0,111,order_amount)),0) success_amount, nvl(sum(decode(order_status,112,0,113,0,111,fee)),0) success_fee from fo.fundout_order where parent_orderId=#parentOrderId#

select nvl(sum(decode(order_status,111,0,112,1,113,1)),0) fail_count, nvl(sum(decode(order_status,111,1,112,0,113,0)),0) success_count, nvl(sum(decode(order_status,111,0,112,order_amount,113,order_amount)),0) fail_amount, nvl(sum(decode(order_status,112,0,113,0,111,order_amount)),0) success_amount, 0 success_fee from fo.pay_toacctorder where parent_orderId=#parentOrderId#

SELECT ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_SMALLTYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_LOGINNAME, PAYEE_MEMBERCODE, PAYEE_MEMBERTYPE, PAYEE_ACCTCODE, PAYEE_ACCTTYPE, PAYMENT_REASON, FAILED_REASON, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TRADE_ALIAS, TRADE_TYPE, FOREIGN_ORDERID, PARENT_ORDERID FROM FO.PAY_TOACCTORDER WHERE PARENT_ORDERID=#parentOrderId#

SELECT ORDER_ID, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_SMALLTYPE, ORDER_STATUS, ORDER_AMOUNT, IS_PAYERPAYFEE, FEE, REALPAY_AMOUNT, REALOUT_AMOUNT, PAYER_NAME, PAYER_LOGINNAME, PAYER_MEMBERCODE, PAYER_MEMBERTYPE, PAYER_ACCTCODE, PAYER_ACCTTYPE, PAYEE_NAME, PAYEE_BANKACCTCODE, PAYEE_BANKACCTTYPE, PAYEE_BANKCODE, PAYEE_BANKNAME, PAYEE_OPENINGBANKNAME, PAYEE_BANKPROVINCE, PAYEE_BANKPROVINCENAME, PAYEE_BANKCITY, PAYEE_BANKCITYNAME, PAYMENT_REASON, FAILED_REASON, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, TRADE_ALIAS, TRADE_TYPE, PAYEE_MOBILE, BANK_ORDERID, FOREIGN_ORDERID, FUNDOUT_BANKCODE, FUNDOUT_BANKNAME, FUNDOUT_MODE, PRIORITY, PARENT_ORDERID, BANK_NUMBER FROM FUNDOUT_ORDER WHERE PARENT_ORDERID=#parentOrderId#
